sentences: Me peame otsustama kelleks j채채me. Tuleb veel mitu otsustada.
context: The Estonian verb 'otsustada' means to make a decision or to come to a conclusion. It's used when someone needs to choose between options or reach a determination about something. The word can appear in various forms including otsustan (I decide), otsustad (you decide), otsustab (he/she/it decides), and otsustama (the infinitive form). In the dictionary definition provided, it's used in the context of organizational autonomy - 'asutuse, organisatsiooni 천igus otsustada teat. k체simusi iseseisvalt' means 'an institution's or organization's right to decide certain questions independently'.
